Articles.Content:
MUST'VE BEEN A PROGRAM GLITCH.  I DID IT AGAIN FROM SCRATCH, DID THE EXACT SAME THING AND THIS TIME IT LET ME HIT NEXT

 

It won't let me past a certain step in the advanced construction tutorial.  It says I am supposed to "place four solar panels on the lower end of the fuel tanks.  Press A to rotate 90 degrees.  Place a set of four batteries between the fuel tanks."  I am obviously doing something wrong because it won't let me click next but I can't figure out what it is.

I'd like to include a picture of what I have done.  Is there a way to attach an image in this forum?  I can see how to insert an image from URL but not how to do it from a picture on my hard drive.

Thanks!!! 

Steve

https://imgur.com/a/RxvbW4K

Edited September 24, 2019 by Steve C.

Hello, @Steve C., and welcome to the forum!

To attach pictures you will need to host them somewhere else, like Imgur, and post the link here.  The forum itself does not host images.
